class_notes:
This course will be taught entirely online and will meet synchronously both days.


This course will examine how American executive branch agencies behave as organizations and how they relate in practice to the rest of the people in government and the nation.
course_description: Examines how American executive branch agencies behave as organizations and how they relate in practice to the rest of the people in government and the nation.
